Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL0: When the slave is not selected by the decoder, all control signals shall be low.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL1: When HTRANS is IDLE, all control signals shall be low.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL2: First transfer of any sequence is NONSEQ in nature.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL3: Non-first transfer of an AHB sequence will always be SEQ in nature.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL4: Burst sequence of length four shall end at fourth occurrence of HREADY.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL5: If this is last transaction of a sequence and next cycle is not start of another sequence, HTRANS shall be IDLE in next cycle.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL6: If HREADY is low, then all control signals, address and data buses shall hold their values.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL7: When the slave is not selected by the decoder, HREADY signal shall be high.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL8: When the slave is not selected by the decoder, HRESP shall be OKAY.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL9: When no AHB transaction is taking place, HRESP shall be OKAY.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL10: RD and WR signal cannot be high simultaneously.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL11: If memory is full and write transfer is attempted, then the slave shall send an ERROR response. Similarly, if the memory is empty and a read transfer is attempted, then the slave shall send an ERROR response.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL12: When slave is involved in a transfer, HWRITE is used to decide values of WR and RD.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL13: When slave is involved in any transfer, signal HADDR is used to decide ADDR.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL14: When slave is involved in write transfer, signal HWDATA is used to decide DI.
Assumptions. The assumptions are as foll.SYMBOL15: When slave is involved in read transfer, signal DO is used to decide HRDATA.

When the slave is not selected by the de.SYMBOL0: the slave is not selected by the decoder
When the slave is not selected by the de.SYMBOL1: all control signals shall be low

When HTRANS is IDLE, all control signals.SYMBOL1: all control signals shall be low

If this is last transaction of a sequenc.SYMBOL0: this is last transaction of a sequence and next cycle is not start of another sequence
If this is last transaction of a sequenc.SYMBOL1: HTRANS shall be IDLE in next cycle

If HREADY is low, then all control signa.SYMBOL1: all control signals, address and data buses shall hold their values.

the slave is not selected by the decoder

If memory is full and write transfer is.SYMBOL1: the slave shall send an ERROR response
If memory is full and write transfer is.SYMBOL2: memory is empty and a read transfer is attempted

When slave is involved in a transfer, HW.SYMBOL0: slave is involved in a transfer
When slave is involved in a transfer, HW.SYMBOL1: HWRITE is used to decide values of WR and RD

When slave is involved in any transfer,.SYMBOL1: signal HADDR is used to decide ADDR

When slave is involved in write transfer.SYMBOL1: signal HWDATA is used to decide DI.

When slave is involved in read transfer,.SYMBOL0: slave is involved in read transfer
When slave is involved in read transfer,.SYMBOL1: signal DO is used to decide HRDATA
